body.name: PURE CLEAN PUCWM11.7 Compact Home Washing Machine-Portable Mini Laundry Clothes Washer, Blue

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 47 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 17 mins
features: EASY TO USE: The portable washer features a convenient top-loading system. Simply insert detergent and water into the portable washer dryer combo. A power cord and drain hose are included
ROTARY CONTROLS: The portable washer machine features rotary controls for wash timer, a quiet motor, and a water-efficient design

COMPACT & HIGH POWER: The portable clothes washer has a high-powered 180-watt motor, wash load capacity of 4.5 lbs, water tank capacity of 19 liters. Watch your clothes get clean with a translucent tub container window
NO INSTALLATION: The portable washer machine makes it easy to start using it right out of the box. The best portable washer does not require any special parts or plumbing
IDEAL FOR SMALL LOADS: A portable washer is perfect for quick loads of essentials, such as underwear, socks, towels, T-shirts and tank tops
body.description: Features: - Convenient Top-Loading Washing Machine - Hassle-Free Operation: Simply Insert Detergent & Water - Does Not Require Any Special Parts or Plumbing - Watch it Work: Translucent Tub Container - Energy & Water Efficient Design - Ideal for Small Laundry Loads - Perfect for Underwear, Socks, T-Shirts & Towels - Rotary Control Wash Timer - Compact & Portable Size Technical Specs: - High-Powered Washing Motor: 180 Watt - Wash-Load Capacity: 4.5 lbs. - Water Tank Capacity: 19 Liters - Noise Level: 57dB - Power Cable Length: 4.8' ft. - Power Supply: 120V - Dimensions: 13.8’’ x 14.1’’ x 19.7’’ -inches

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #5,446 in Appliances (See Top 100 in Appliances) #680 in Portable Clothes Washing Machines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so great!
reviews.reviewText: So far so good! Purchased this to expedite the cleaning process of my gecko food + water dishes (bottle caps + contact lens cases) and after two rinses with lukewarm water the caps are nearly clean! (20/25 minutes time of refilling water, draining, and rerunning a 6/8 minute cycle)I’d imagine it’d be very effective with small loads of clothes, beach/pool towels, etc. will update after time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken on Arrival
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the Pyle Pure Clean Portable Single Tub Washing Machine:The appliance was broken right out of the box. After plugging it in, the washing machine wouldnt start. The circuitry must have been defective as well because it sparked. Then I could smell something burning.Also, there is no spin cycle. You must wring out the clothes and hang them to dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Definitely requires your interaction.
reviews.reviewText: overall I'm happy with this little machine, and while it does have a motor, it's not technically a mini washing machine in the sense that all it can do is twist around and around and then reverse. My laundry, no matter what I do to try and avoid it, inevitably ends up twisted very tightly up if I leave it to swish around in this washer. You need to either be outside or put the saying in a bathtub. I filled mine with a hose from outside. The hoses provided is kind of a small ridiculous plastic one that doesn't work, at least not for me. But on the upside this thing saves a ton of water and electricity and I am happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and works!
reviews.reviewText: Great little machine. We are taking it camping in our little RV. I hate using the campground laundry, you never know what they will be like and some are nasty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Low capacity but does adequate job.
reviews.reviewText: This washing machine has low capacity- two pair of shorts and one pair of lightweight pants are about the max per load. The cheap plastic drain hose developed leaks so I will replace that with a more stout vinyl hose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Paid for new got used and broken
reviews.reviewText: Unit arrived dirty, scratched, and broken despite ordering and paying the price for a new one. Return options don’t include “yeah I’ll deep clean it myself but this is gross and I want refunded the difference” so reviewing instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Drain hose cracked after a week
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, the hose cracked after a week of use. It did work good while it lasted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke after four uses
reviews.reviewText: The plastic drain pipe broke after four uses. I highly do not recommend.
